description: This file contains CSS styles for theming and layout management in a React-based frontend application. It defines light and dark theme colors, styles for various UI components, and responsive design rules.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application styling including background color, text color, and layout properties.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo, including size and animation properties.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styling for the main header of the application, including layout and background properties.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application, including color and transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button, including positioning, appearance, and hover effects.
